Articles.Content:
I finally got around to putting this thing together. They were handing these out at the KSC Visitor Complex on Orion's launch day. I thought it turned out pretty good, although I'm not sure why they made the docking collar stick out so far, even in the art that came with the model, the docking mechanism is pretty much flush with the top of the pod. You can also download and print this from NASA's website here: http://www.nasa.gov/sites/default/files/files/2014_Orion_Desk_Model.pdf or the slightly older model with the circular solar panels here: http://www.nasa.gov/pdf/714676main_Orion_Model.pdf Also, if you are interested, my photos from Orion's launch day(s) are here: http://imgur.com/a/mnw5W

Javascript is disabled. View full album
Thanks for the link, it is going to look good beside the cartoony Rosetta papercraft I made in november.
No problem! Let me know if you figure out what the mystery slots are for on the Service Module Forward Bulkhead. Slots 17, 18, 19, & 20 seem to have no purpose whatsoever.
